creator: Beurer GmbH
descriptionHtml:
There is a place of calm in each of us – it is time to discover it in you.
The free "beurer CalmDown" app is the perfect addition to the beurer stress releaZer. Regular and conscious breathing exercises reduce your personal stress level in a natural way. Enjoy the gentle vibration and soothing heat of the device. The app also provides you with the following relaxation aids:
• different relaxation melodies
• audiovisually guided breathing
• binaural beats
• light support on the display
• 6-week programme

The exercises bring harmony to your breathing rhythm and your heart rate variability (HRV), i.e. the duration of the intervals between each of your heartbeats, improves. This means you feel more relaxed and there is a positive effect on your cardiovascular system.

Binaural beats are created in the brain and are an acoustic illusion. Each ear receives tones in different frequencies. Your brain waves are stimulated, promoting relaxation and concentration.
Leave everyday stress behind. The beurer stress releaZer and the "beurer CalmDown" app make it easy for you to enjoy short breaks, during which you can recharge your batteries.
descriptionShort: The "beurer CalmDown" app is the perfect addition to the beurer stress releaZer.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes have also been carried out during this update, to provide even greater ease of use.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The following new features await you in the new version:
Integrated stress measurement via the app
New & modern app design
New relaxing melodies

title: beurer CalmDown

creator: Beurer GmbH
descriptionHtml:
There is a place of calm in each of us – it is time to discover it in you.

The free "beurer CalmDown" app is the perfect addition to the Beurer stress releaZer. Regular and conscious breathing exercises reduce your personal stress level in a natural way. Enjoy the gentle vibration and soothing heat of the device.

The app also provides you with the following relaxation aids:
• Different relaxation melodies
Our new relaxing melodies will help you fully recuperate. Combine three musical genres (forest, beach, jungle) and three instruments (guitar, harp, piano) for up to nine different melodies.

• Audiovisually guided breathing
The exercises bring harmony to your breathing rhythm and your heart rate variability (HRV), i.e. the duration of the intervals between each of your heartbeats, improves. This means you feel more relaxed and there is a positive effect on your cardiovascular system.

• Binaural beats
Binaural beats are created in the brain and are an acoustic illusion. Each ear receives tones in different frequencies. Your brain waves are stimulated, promoting relaxation and concentration.

• Integrated stress measurement
Easily measure your stress levels and ability to relax with the smartphone camera. By continuously measuring stress in combination with the breathing exercises of the beurer stress releaZer, you can reduce your stress level.

Leave everyday stress behind. The Beurer stress releaZer and the "beurer CalmDown" app make it easy for you to enjoy short breaks, during which you can recharge your batteries.
descriptionShort: The "beurer CalmDown" app is the perfect addition to the beurer stress releaZer.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: You can now also use the app in dark mode. This makes using the app in darker rooms more pleasant and protects the eyes.
